website_summaries.verdict: The Brother ImageCenter ADS-3000N is a capable document scanner that can connect via USB or Ethernet, scan directly to USB keys, and wirelessly to mobile devices.
pros: Scans directly to a USB key and through a Wi-Fi access point to mobile devices
cons: Scan utility offers only limited ability to store profile when scanning from front panel
Slow in scanning to searchable PDF format in testing

customer_reviews.title: Nearly there.
customer_reviews.text: Sorry Brother. I have many receipts to and when Scanning few at a time, some are always deskewed. After time it gets annoying and frustration kicks in. It doesn’t scan anything much more grader than an basic paper grade where other similar scanners would. User interface is ok but could be made easier to work with.
customer_reviews.author: somxx

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant and fast.
customer_reviews.text: It’s a fast capable up to A4 scanner that does double sided and multiple sheets. Works on USB and network in colour or B&W. My best scanner I’ve used so far. Brilliant.
customer_reviews.author: Clive Flint

customer_reviews.title: Really does 60 pges per min but had to download other software
customer_reviews.text: Great but had to download other software. Really does 60 double sided per minute but you are slowed by the need to name each scan but how do you get around that? Couldn't do without it in the office.
customer_reviews.author: John - UK

customer_reviews.title: Avoid this rubbish!
customer_reviews.text: What rubbish! I standard 80gsm A4 paper.... Jams, I jams, jams, pulls two sheets through all the time. Forget the fact a post it note makes it error out and throw a tantrum, the fact it pulls multiple sheets all the times when using standard good quality paper makes it useless. Here comes the fight with Brother. Please avoid this rubbish and buy another brand.
customer_reviews.author: Ben Collins

customer_reviews.title: Not as fantastic as stated
customer_reviews.text: Not the high quality stated on the product overview. When scanning in pages, there are lines on the scanned file. The machine scans pages in upside down so you have to change the settings to autorotate pages but when you’re scanning in a doc that is 100 pages, it only does this to certain pages so there is no peace of mind that the doc is scanned correctly.
customer_reviews.author: DJspark

customer_reviews.title: Works on Apple
customer_reviews.text: Love this. Use it at work, got it on network and use off iMac and no issues for last three months, fast scanner and others use as well
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: An amazing modern scanner
customer_reviews.text: This is an amazing scanner. The scanning speed is unbelieavable but the ability to scan directly tp pc email dropbox google drive onedrive makes it a really modern day scanner of the 21st century
customer_reviews.author: Joshua B.

customer_reviews.title: No fuss
customer_reviews.text: It just does the job it was bought for, no fuss. I found the free software does it's job. Some reviews criticised the software, but it does what I need without a problem.
customer_reviews.author: Mr F

customer_reviews.title: Superb scanner
customer_reviews.text: Superb scanner. Terrific web interface facilitates things like scanning to network drive and even scanning directly to printer via printer FTP server.
customer_reviews.author: Somerville Associates Limited

customer_reviews.title: Excellant product
customer_reviews.text: Excellent scanner; easy to set up and use. Hugh quality scans; fast; no jams.
customer_reviews.author: Ghuffar U.

customer_reviews.title: Very good
customer_reviews.text: Great scanner but whatever you do don’t print out the user guide when prompted. It’s about 500 pages long!!
customer_reviews.author: Martyn Cawthorne

customer_reviews.title: Superb Scanner
customer_reviews.text: I used to have a Brother ADS-2600WE but Brother has discontinued software support for this model - it is not developing 64 Bit software which is needed for compatibility with the latest (and ongoing) Max OS. Very annoying, as there was nothing at all wrong with that model. The ADS-3600W is also superb. Fast duplex scanning; virtually no sheet feed errors; on-board features including scan to email / scan to PC / scan to network folder; fast start-up. It's quieter than the 2600 as well, which is a bonus. I highly recommend this machine.
customer_reviews.author: Ian

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Excellent scanner: very easy to set up and extremely fast! Very compact too, so suitable for small offices and homes. Scans double sided as well as single page. With all sorts of paperwork we receive through the post these days, this scanner will definitely make our lives a lot easier. Can scan from desktops, laptops and mobile devices via apps.
customer_reviews.author: Chatterbox

product_meta.title: Brother ADS-3000N Document Scanner, USB 3.0/Network, High Speed Business Scanner, Desktop, 2 Sided Scanning, 50PPM, A4 Scanner, Includes AC Adapter, USB Cable and Professional Software
product_meta.description:
Size Name:50 ppm| Style Name:USB 3.0 and Wired Network (ADS-3000N)

The Brother ADS3000N high speed scanner is perfect for businesses needing a fast, high-volume network desktop scanner.

Network Scanners
Offering true network capability with no need to install software at multiple location points, the ADS-3000N network scanner allow documents to be scanned directly from the machine to multiple devices. With one simple press of a button scans can be quickly and easily shared across teams and departments; improving workflow efficiency and increasing productivity.

Programmable Keys
For quick and easy scanning, the keys on the ADS-3000N can be easily programmed to instantly send scanned documents to pre-selected destinations, scanning directly to departmental folders, frequently used email addresses or OCR (Optical Character Recognition) software, limiting error and reducing staff training.

Mixed media with professional results
From 2-sided A4 and mixed batches of business cards, receipts for expenses to multi-page documents and extra-long paper, the ADS-3000N can easily manage the paper through the Automatic Document Feeder (ADF).

Advanced Image Processing
Damaged documents are cleaned and image quality improved for storing, editing, sharing and OCR (Optical Character Recognition). The file sizes are reduced for easy sharing and clear digital files are generated for effortless reading, so that you spend less time manually preparing and correcting documents.

Multifeed Detection
This system uses sound waves to identify potential misfeeds. The paper pathway is automatically suspended and the user alerted if an irregular signal is detected, reducing the risk of damaged documents and lost data.

Advanced Reverse Roller System
This advanced system manages incoming bulk paper jobs so only one sheet is processed at a time, for outstanding reliability when scanning a variety of document types and weights.

Scan to USB Host
Save time by scanning documents directly to an external storage drive.

Free to download software and drivers
This Brother ADS-3000N is ready to go with powerful business card and document management software for Windows and macOS from Nuance and ABBYY - ideal for creating and editing PDFs and much more.



BOX CONTAINS


 * 1 x Brother ADS-3000N document scanner
 * 1 x UK 3-Pin AC adapter/power supply cable
 * 1 x USB 3.0 cable
 * 1 x Software disc
 * 1 x Product safety guide
 * 1 x Quick setup guide
 * 1 x Warranty card
feature_bullets: 2-SIDED SCANNING: Scans single and double-sided documents in a single pass, in both colour and black/white, at up to 50 ppm
CONNECTIVITY: Gigabit Ethernet wired network and SuperSpeed USB 3.0 connectivity
VERSATILITY: Easily scans business and embossed plastic I.D. cards, receipts, photos and documents via 50-sheet mixed media auto-feeder
EFFICIENCY: Supports clear, accurate scanning at up to 1200 x 1200dpi (interpolated) resolution. Loaded with advanced image processing features
INDUSTRY LEADING SOFTWARE: Free premium software essentials bundle including ABBYY FineReader Sprint, ABBYY PDF Transformer+ and Nuance PaperPort

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.3 out of 5 stars57 ratings4.3 out of 5 stars
